sen.j: スーパー歌舞伎（－かぶき）は、市川猿之助 (3代目)が1986年に始めた、歌舞伎とは異なる演出による現代風歌舞伎。
sen.e: The Super Kabuki is a modernized, contemporary Kabuki dance drama directed in a different manner from the original, classical Kabuki theatrical dance, which was introduced by the 3rd Ennosuke ICHIKAWA in 1986.

The Super Kabuki is a modernized, contemporary Kabuki dance drama directed in a different manner from the original, classical Kabuki theatrical dance, which was introduced by the third Ennosuke ICHIKAWA in 1986.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。
sen.e: The Super Kabuki is a modernized, contemporary Kabuki dance drama directed in a different manner from the original, classical Kabuki theatrical dance, which was introduced by the third Ennosuke ICHIKAWA in 1986.

sen.j: 新橋演舞場などで上演されることが多い。
sen.e: It is often performed at Shinbashi Theatre.
It is often performed at Shinbashi Enbujo (Shinbashi Theatre) and so on.
It is often performed at Shinbashi Enbujo (Shinbashi Theatre) and so on.

sen.j: 第一作は梅原猛の脚本による「ヤマトタケル」であった。
sen.e: The first performance of the Super Kabuki was "YAMATO Takeru" scripted by Takeshi UMEHARA.
The first performance of the Super Kabuki was 'YAMATO Takeru' scripted by Takeshi UMEHARA.
The first performance of the Super Kabuki was 'YAMATO Takeru' scripted by Takeshi UMEHARA.

tit.e: The premiere performances of the Super Kabuki
